comments.body:
It looks like the license file has been recently been added to the upstream `MANIFEST.in`, but it is not distributed in the current release. Please manually package the license file for now, and then when the next releases comes out you can remove it when you update the feedstock.

https://conda-forge.org/docs/maintainer/adding_pkgs.html#packaging-the-license-manually
@synapticarbors thank you, this is a good idea. Now we need to resolve tests.

It looks like the test data is not included in the source distribution. This would need to be fixed upstream. That said, conda-forge, doesn't require that you run the tests. The imports showing existence are usually enough. If you want to remove running the test suite for now, I can merge and then once the files are in-place in a future release, the feedstock can be updated to then run the tests again.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +38,42 @@  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: License.txt
  summary: "API for the DHI MIKE file types"
  description: "Read, write and manipulate dfs0, dfs1, dfs2, dfs3, dfsu and mesh files. Read res1d and xns11 files."
